Finally! The Ultimate Thailand Trip is here! And we are inviting you to see what all the Thailand hype is about. This is your moment to experience a lavishly holiday at a VERY low price.

If you just felt your heart skip a beat, then this trip is for you. Why? Because you know that an all planned holiday to some of the world's most icon destinations is exactly what you need after 3 years of lockdown.

Join us and 9 other like-minded solo and travel pairs on this once in a lifetime journey through southern Thailand. During this 10-day group trip, you are guaranteed to make lifelong friends and create priceless memories. You will also be traveling with us to some of the places you've seen in our stories and all over social media.

Watch the video below to see some of the epic spots that we're taking you to or click the "apply now" button to get this journey started! - Hurry, Thailand is a VERY popular destination for obvious reasons. This trip is HIGH IN DEMAND and spots are limited to 10 people!

Thailand is calling. You're best life is happening right now.

What's included?

Island hopping

  • 10 days in Thailand
  • Explore over 10 different islands
  • Trip to Aosane Beach and Freedom Beach
  • Two nights on Koh Phi Phi Don
  • Longtail boat trip to Phi Phi Le, Maya Bay, Monkey Beach and Viking cave
  • Snorkling Trip
  • Longtail boat trip to Hong Islands, Pakbia Island and Lading Island
  • James Bond Island and Koh Panyee

    • Cultural attractions and national parks

    Visit FIVE different national parks

  • Dragon crest Mountain
  • Emerald Pool Khlong Thom Neua
  • Krabi Natural Thermal Baths and Hot Springs
  • Koh Panyee Muslim Fishing Village
  • Tiger Cave Temple, Wat Suwan Khuka, Wat Kaew Manee Si Mahathat
  • Koh Panyee Muslim Fishing Village
  • Monkey Hill
  • Phuket Big Buddha
  • Phuket Old Town
  • Sunday Market Walking Street

    Who is this exciting trip to Thailand for? This Thailand trip is for you if...

    You've traveled solo or as a pair before, but want to travel with friends

    You love traveling alone or with a partner, but you're also a social butterful and would love to meet more like-mind people. You want to create amazing memories with amazing people, and just go with the flow without ever feeling unsafe.

    You want a luxury holiday, but have a "backpacker budget"

    Because this is a group trip, we've been able to split transport costs, get LOCAL prices and bring you luxury at a backpacker's price! Since we live in Thailand, we've also been able to pull some strings and get you the best deals!

    You want to travel more, but don't enjoy the planning

    Good news! We love the planning and have been to every single spot on this trip... TWICE! Don't worry about missing any must-do thing, because we've included everything you need to see in southern Thailand.

    You want to travel, but still have covid PTSD

    If you really want to travel again, but still feel unsure or anxious, because of the global pandemic, then this is the best way for you to start. We will support you through ever step and have arranged high-end, safe/clean accommodation.

    You like doing day trips, but always get stuck with 50 randoms and a tour guide shouting instructions

    This group trip will be NOTHING like that! The whole essence of this trip is outlined to just be a group of friends, traveling around and sharing amazing experiences together. This Thailand trip has it all. You will be taken to some of the most interesting and beautiful places on Earth. We love trying new things and have curated an experience that will make you fall in love with Thailand as much as we do.

    To sum things up:

    This trip is for you if you: love having new experiences with like-minded people, enjoy saving on travel costs, want to have the most amazing experiences at an affordable rate, want to see some of the most beautiful national parks Thailand has to offer. Lastly, this IS FOR YOU if you need time to relax.

    Part of you is like, I'M SO IN SIGN ME UP, but then the other part of you still has some doubts… Does this sound like you?

    But I usually plan things myself and do my own thing…

    We speak to travelers that come to Thailand all the time and the common issue they face is that they miss out on a lot of the must-do activities, and end up having looong trips in buses that are always uncomfortable. They almost always get caught in the infamous tourist traps, and end up spending more money for less. In his trip, we’ve included ALL the must-see places: Over 10 Islands, hikes, temples, hot springs, emerald pools, old town markets and so much more.

    I've done a tour before and it was not what it said it would be…

    Firstly, that really sucks! We see this often: tour agents booking you a trip to a country they have NEVER been to themselves. We have personally done this exact trip many times and will personally be there with you to experience it again! We love it so much and have the perfect balance between relaxing and adventure!

    But I can’t pay for the trip all at once…

    We have put together a payment plan that is budget friendly and enables you to pay in segments without breaking the bank. The group trip allows us to split the expensive parts of travelling solo or in a pair, so you can have an unforgettable Thailand experience at a fraction of the cost of a usual Thailand trip.

    But I already have plans to go to Thailand

    This trip has everything and more than you could want from a trip to Thailand at a very reasonable price. Save time on your trip that is usually spent scouting for the best excursions and trips and enjoy the moments you have. We have sourced the best possible deals so that you can rest assured that your experience will be an unforgettable one.

    I’ve already been to Thailand…

    There is a reason why we have visited Thailand over 15 times and have chosen it to be our base, it really is that good. Thailand is a melting pot of culture, food and tradition all jam packed into one big country filled with limestone mountains and crystal clear waters. You’ve got temples, mountains, islands, ricefields, markets, bustling urban cities. 15 times is not enough.

    I don't have time to travel…

    You need to make the decision for yourself. The truth is, if you don’t have enough time to treat yourself now with a once in a lifetime trip to one of the world's most beautiful places, you will never be able to make enough time for anything. You do have enough time to go on holiday. In fact, you need to go on holiday, because rest is good for your soul. "Not enough time" is an excuse to stay in your comfort zone, when in actual fact, the best things you’ll ever experience are outside your comfort zone.

    FAQs

    Why should I come on this trip to Thailand?

    There is a reason Thailand is one of the most visited countries in the world. It is absolutly breathtaking and mind blowing. From the people to the nature, culture to food-Thailand is a bucketlist country, and we've put together a trip jam packed with all the MUST-DO'S on a Thailand trip. All the hassle of planning and getting pulled into tourist traps taken off your shoulders. We have personally gone to each and every place (twice). Not only will we be going to the most perfect places, But going together as a group and actually living in Thailand has enabled us to arrange the best experiences.

    What is this Thailand trip all about?

    This trip is custom designed to experience the best that Southern Thailand has to offer. We’ve planned everyday so that fun, chill and adventure are perfectly balanced. Also, with the nature of this trip, if you want more chill than fun, then put your feet up at your relaxing resort(s). Want to spend a day or two soaking in the sun next to the hotel pool? Sure! Or how about getting a Thai massage for that matter? Sounds like the perfect getaway!

    How much does it cost?

    Today, you can join the Ultimate Trip to Thailand for a one time payment of only $1970 or a payment plan can be arranged. This trip is at a fraction of the price compared to what you would spend if you organized the same trip yourself. For only $1970, you're getting all accommodation, breakfast, transport in Thailand, national park entry fees for 10 DAYS! EVERYTHING is included except lunch and dinner. (We purposely excluded lunches and dinners on this trip, because one of the beauties of Thailand is that you can spend as low as $1.50 a meal or you can spend however much you want depending on your preferences.) But the real question you should ask isn't "How much is it?", the rather "Can I afford to put off my dreams for another year?"
    In fact, this trip shouldn't have a price tag, because the treasured memories you'll make will be priceless.

    Is a payment plan available?

    Yes, a payment plan is available for everyone wanting to join the ultimate Thailand trip. The payment plan falls over a 3 month period with 3 instalments of $510.

    Is Thailand safe?

    Honestly, Thailand is one of the safest places we know. We never feel unsafe and the islands are even safer. We actually leave our phones at restaurants all the time and have little ladies chasing us down the road to come fetch our phone. Lol. (Obviously, not recommened! Try remember your things.)

    Thailand entry requirements (visa, vaccine)

    Thailand is FULLY open to vaccinated and non vaccinated tourists with a visa on arrival. For regular updated info, check out this page.

    Am I guaranteed spot if I apply?

    We want to make sure that everyone that attends this trip is genuine, rad and "safe to be around". So no, just applying does not guarantee you a spot. Once you apply, we will jump on a call with you and get to know you a little better. Spots are filled up on a first-come-first serve basis, so if you don’t get a spot chances are that you applied too late. We have already started receiving deposits. Spots are filling up quickly!
